gamble_text_10: THE MAX WIN DURING GAMBLE FEATURE IS UP TO x500 FROM YOUR TOTAL BET.
gamble_text_2: TO GAMBLE ANY WIN PRESS THE GAMBLE BUTTON.
gamble_text_3: THEN SELECT RED OR BLACK CARD.
gamble_text_4: WIN IS DOUBLED (X2) IF RED OR BLACK CHOICE IS CORRECT, IF CHOICE OF CARD IS INCORRECT ALL GAMBLE AMOUNT WILL BE LOST.
gamble_text_5: WINNINGS CAN BE GAMBLED UP TO FIVE (5) TIMES.
gamble_text_6: THE GAMBLE FEATURE IS NOT AVAILABLE DURING AUTOPLAY.
gamble_text_7: GAMBLE - RISK YOUR WIN TO HAVE A CHANCE TO DOUBLE IT.
gamble_text_8: COLLECT - COLLECT THE WIN TO YOUR BALANCE.
gamble_text_9: IN CASE OF AN INTERRUPTION DURING A WIN, THE GAMBLE FEATURE WILL NOT BE ACCESSIBLE WHEN PROCEEDING.
history_not_available: THE GAME HISTORY IS AVAILABLE ONLY WHEN PLAYING FOR REAL MONEY.
jackpot_3: THE JACKPOT WAS WON BY ANOTHER PLAYER
jackpot_menu_2:
• The Jackpot is a progressive Jackpot, where every time the game is played by a real money player a portion of the bet is added to the Jackpots.
• Each player, playing in real money mode can randomly win a Jackpot.
• The amounts of each Jackpot are shown in a visible place on any of Jackpot Series Games.
• To win the Jackpots there is no requirement of hitting any symbols on the reels or collecting any bonuses, the player must use real money mode to have a chance of winning the Jackpot.
• High bet players have more chance of winning the Jackpots than low bet players.
• When one of the Jackpots is won, the slot game will freeze, a big treasure box will show up on your screen, introducing the win amount.
• Progressive Jackpot wins are subject to verification by the Casino Operator and the Software Supplier.
All decisions are final and no correspondence will be entered into.
jackpot_menu_3:
• Jackpot values displayed in the game are delayed by up to 30 seconds. On exceptionally rare occasions, it may happen that two Jackpots are won within those 30 seconds, in which case the win of the second Jackpot is the new re-seeded Jackpot which (on very rare occasions) is smaller than the previous Jackpot won.
• After a Jackpot win, the initial Jackpot seed amount will be equal to a 10% out of the last Jackpot
win amount.
• When one game round makes a claim for a certain Jackpot, it is locked for that game round and simultaneously assured that no other game round can claim the same Jackpot. Therefore, it is technically not possible to have two simultaneous wins of the same Jackpot.
• If the communication between the Casino and Jackpot server fails, the game becomes unavailable. There will be no contributions or claims towards the Jackpot. The Jackpot amount remains the same until
the communication is resumed.
jackpot_menu_4:
• The Progressive Jackpot amount paid out is the Progressive Jackpot value on the casino server when a Jackpot is won. Every effort is made to ensure that the Progressive Jackpot value displayed in the game is the same as the one on the casino server.
• The Jackpot counter might be displayed in a currency other than that you are playing in. If you win a Jackpot and are playing casino games with a different currency, the amount won is converted to the currency in which you are playing and is added to your account.
• All Jackpot Series Games by FUGASO software contains Mini, Midi and Maxi Jackpots. The following contributions are made from each bet:
    ◦ 2% of the bet is contributed to the MINI Jackpot.
    ◦ 1.5% of the bet is contributed to the MIDI Jackpot.
    ◦ 1% of the bet is contributed to the MAXI Jackpot.
    ◦ The current Jackpot amount for each type of jackpot is displayed at the game.
    ◦ The Jackpot cannot be won when PLAYING FOR FUN.

menu_p1_t04: <w>SCATTER</w> wins are paid independently of bet lines.
menu_p2_t01:
Bet lines pay if in succession from leftmost to rightmost.
Only the highest win per pay line is paid.
Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
menu_p4_t02:
• FORTUNE CIRCUS is a 5-reel, 3-row, 20-line classic slot featuring WILD Substitutions and SCATTER wins.
• This game is played with 20 fixed bet lines and different bet levels.

tournament_rules_prize_1:
Take a part in "Book of Billionaire"

tournament_rules_rules_1: The minimum bet to qualify in the tournament is %e%s
tournament_rules_rules_10: 7. The more tournament points you collect, the higher your position on the tournament leaderboard.
tournament_rules_rules_11: 8. The first %s players on the tournament leaderboard at a certain given period of time, will share a prize of €%s!
tournament_rules_rules_12: 9. This tournament is available during real money play only.
tournament_rules_rules_13: 10. No additional deposits or costs are required to participate in this tournament.
tournament_rules_rules_14: 11. Prizes will be credited to your casino account no later than 24 hours from acceptance of the tournament results.
tournament_rules_rules_15: 12. The tournament leaderboard will automatically update every few minutes.
tournament_rules_rules_16: 13. Each player will get a personal tournament ID for the tournament leaderboard.
tournament_rules_rules_17: 14. Changing the currency during the tournament period might reset the player's progress on the tournament leaderboard.
tournament_rules_rules_18: 15. The tournament leaderboard will include top players who accumulated the highest amount of tournament points during this tournament.
tournament_rules_rules_19: 16. If two or more players have the same amount of tournament points at the end of this tournament, the player who reached the tournament points first will be ranked higher.
tournament_rules_rules_20: 17. Players with higher stakes have more chance of winning the tournament than players with lower stakes.
tournament_rules_rules_21: 18. Cash prize pool is €%s, in such case where one of the tournament winners is using a different currency on their stakes, the cash prize will convert to the currency in which you are playing and will be added to your casino account.
tournament_rules_rules_22: 19. Only finished bets will qualify for the leaderboard.
tournament_rules_rules_23: 20. The tournament rules can be changed at any time according to Fugaso's sole discretion.
tournament_rules_rules_24: 21. Fugaso will publish the list of winners after the tournament has ended at https://fugaso.com/
tournament_rules_rules_25: 22. Malfunction voids all play and pays.
tournament_rules_rules_26: 23. Fugaso reserves the right to void scores and, or prizes that might be subject to fraud and manipulation activities of the tournament or game process.
tournament_rules_rules_27: 24. By qualifying for this tournament, you automatically agree to these terms and conditions and to all the terms and conditions set by the online casino hosting this tournament.
tournament_rules_rules_4: 1. To participate in "Book Of Billionaire" series tournament by Fugaso you must be over 18 years of age and meet all other requirements, as defined by our Tournament Rules as well as Terms and Conditions.
tournament_rules_rules_5:
2. Play any of the tournament participating Fugaso games with a minimum bet of €%s or the currency equivalent is required.
*Subject to change during the tournament according to currency rate fluctuations*
tournament_rules_rules_6: 3. If the minimum bet amount is unavailable, round up to the next higher available bet size in the game.
tournament_rules_rules_7: 4. Tournament points are calculated every round with each €1 (or currency equivalent) bet equaling %s points, for example, a €1 bet represents %s tournament points.
tournament_rules_rules_8: 5. Tournament points are calculated every round with each €1 (or currency equivalent) won equaling %s points, for example, a €10 win represents %s tournament points.
tournament_rules_rules_9: 6. Tournament points received are summed up throughout the tournament period.
